entry.title: Extract Xbox 360 ISO - Nautilus script
entry.content:
``` tar zxvf extract-xiso_v2.7_src_110930_by_somski.tar.gz cd extract-xiso make extract-xiso sudo chmod +x extract-xiso chmod +x extract-xiso ./extract-xiso sudo cp extract-xiso /bin

/home/piotr/.local/share/nautilus/scripts

nowy plik: Wypakuj obraz X360

chmod +x

zawartosc:

!/bin/bash

IFS=$‘\n’ for file in $NAUTILUS_SCRIPT_SELECTED_FILE_PATHS do gnome-terminal -x extract-xiso -x $file done ```
